bug.author: awaemmanuel
bug.summary: [BUG] - Update SETUP.md to correctly show how to install editable packages via pip
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
SETUP.md instructions for installing the utils is not correct. Should be pip install -e . and not pip install -e utils_nlp <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
